option.name: servers
option.value:
[{"name":"postgres","status":"running","tools":[{"name":"list_schemas","description":"List all schemas in the database","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{},"title":"list_schemasArguments"},"_status":"enabled"},{"name":"list_objects","description":"List objects in a schema","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"schema_name":{"title":"Schema Name","type":"string"},"object_type":{"title":"Object Type","type":"string"}},"required":["schema_name"],"title":"list_objectsArguments"},"_status":"enabled"},{"name":"get_object_details","description":"Show detailed information about a database object","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"schema_name":{"title":"Schema Name","type":"string"},"object_name":{"title":"Object Name","type":"string"},"object_type":{"title":"Object Type","type":"string"}},"required":["schema_name","object_name"],"title":"get_object_detailsArguments"},"_status":"enabled"},{"name":"explain_query","description":"Explains the execution plan for a SQL query, showing how the database will execute it and provides detailed cost estimates.","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"sql":{"title":"Sql","type":"string"},"analyze":{"title":"Analyze","type":"boolean"},"hypothetical_indexes":{"title":"Hypothetical Indexes","type":"array"}},"required":["sql"],"title":"explain_queryArguments"},"_status":"enabled"},{"name":"analyze_workload_indexes","description":"Analyze frequently executed queries in the database and recommend optimal indexes","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"max_index_size_mb":{"title":"Max Index Size Mb","type":"integer"},"method":{"title":"Method","type":"string"}},"title":"analyze_workload_indexesArguments"},"_status":"enabled"},{"name":"analyze_query_indexes","description":"Analyze a list of (up to 10) SQL queries and recommend optimal indexes","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"queries":{"title":"Queries","type":"array"},"max_index_size_mb":{"title":"Max Index Size Mb","type":"integer"},"method":{"title":"Method","type":"string"}},"required":["queries"],"title":"analyze_query_indexesArguments"},"_status":"enabled"},{"name":"analyze_db_health","description":"Analyzes database health. Here are the available health checks:
- index - checks for invalid, duplicate, and bloated indexes
- connection - checks the number of connection and their utilization
- vacuum - checks vacuum health for transaction id wraparound
- sequence - checks sequences at risk of exceeding their maximum value
- replication - checks replication health including lag and slots
- buffer - checks for buffer cache hit rates for indexes and tables
- constraint - checks for invalid constraints
- all - runs all checks
You can optionally specify a single health check or a comma-separated list of health checks. The default is 'all' checks.","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"health_type":{"title":"Health Type","type":"string"}},"title":"analyze_db_healthArguments"},"_status":"enabled"},{"name":"get_top_queries","description":"Reports the slowest or most resource-intensive queries using data from the 'pg_stat_statements' extension.","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"sort_by":{"title":"Sort By","type":"string"},"limit":{"title":"Limit","type":"integer"}},"title":"get_top_queriesArguments"},"_status":"enabled"},{"name":"execute_sql","description":"Execute any SQL query","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"sql":{"title":"Sql","type":"string"}},"title":"execute_sqlArguments"},"_status":"enabled"}]},{"name":"digitalwall","status":"error","tools":[],"error":"message: MCP error -32001: Request timed out stack: McpError: MCP error -32001: Request timed out
 at Timeout.timeoutHandler (/snapshot/copilot-client/node_modules/@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/src/shared/protocol.ts:591:43)
 at listOnTimeout (node:internal/timers:581:17)
 at processTimers (node:internal/timers:519:7)"}]
